job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: The Sponsored Products Allocation and Pricing Team is responsible for auctions that drive a multi-billion dollar advertising program. We use data-driven approaches to make trade-offs between publisher, advertiser, and shopper concerns as a part of Sponsored Products Ads program. With a broad mandate to experiment and innovate using the power of data science, big data and machine learning, we are growing at an unprecedented rate with a seemingly endless range of new opportunities.  As a Machine Learning Engineer on the Sponsored Products Allocation and Pricing Team, you’ll have a unique opportunity to build our next generation platform to leverage vast amounts of data and machine learning techniques to optimize auctions for Sponsored Products on Amazon. You’ll work with Product Managers, Economists and Scientists to solve complex problems at Amazon-scale bringing your engineering skills together with the powers of AWS to launch solutions that will have direct customer impact.  Amazon is investing heavily in building a world class advertising business, and we define and delivering a collection of self-service performance advertising products that drive discovery and sales. Our products are strategically important to our Retail and Marketplace businesses driving long-term growth. We are a highly motivated, collaborative and fun-loving team building a high growth business. This is an opportunity to make a significant impact on the future of the Amazon vision.
